name: The Mysterious Death of Anna Gomide
name_original: The Mysterious Death of Anna Gomide
description:
The Mysterious Death of Anna Gomide is a text-based puzzle game.

Play as a detective running through Anna Gomide's computer to unveil her assassin's identity.

You must hurry, as the battery on the laptop is running out!

-----

This game was developed by Luan Motta (https://luanmm.itch.io/) using C#

The source code is available in the file "AnnaGomide_sourcecode.cs".

The ASCII title font is 'smkeyboard' and was created by Kent Nassen

ASCII title created on http://www.figlet.org

This game was submitted to "Everything is text Jam 1"

Distributed under CC BY-SA 4.0 license

Except, maybe, the ASCII Title font, as I could not find a use license linked to it.
